page.title: 18Games.
page.content: There are lots of places where people can play games in Reepham.The most popular organised games are Football, Cricket,and Hockey. Nearly all the people we asked needed special equipment. It is provided mostly by the school and family.Boys and girls in our class like to play running games like Dot to Dot and Double Tag.Groups of about twenty to thirty people play these games.Not many people play by themselves.On certain nights if you go to the High School there are organised games.You can play Squash at the Brewery House.In the holidays people sometimes play computer games.If its snowy they play snowball fights and play on thier sledges,going down slopes.My favourite games are Football,Cricket,and Hockey. I play them about once a week.
